- **Memory layout**: Standard virt machine memory map starting at 0x40000000
    
- **Peripheral addresses**: GIC at 0x08000000, UART at 0x09000000[](https://docs.nordicsemi.com/bundle/ncs-latest/page/zephyr/boards/qemu/cortex_a53/doc/index.html)
    

**Device tree**: Auto-generated hardware description passed to guest OS
